issue.title: Python: Windows wheels don't include .lib files.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1606](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1606). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These files are needed to link against `pyarrow` natively. Surfaced in https://ci.appveyor.com/project/MathMagique/turbodbc/build/master%20-%20%23297/job/wg9gxnfol9ynkmao / https://github.com/blue-yonder/turbodbc/pull/125

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1606?focusedCommentId=16180446) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1127
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1127>
